efforts.name: Development Setup
efforts.description: Establish your development environment and get started with the Orchestrator AI platform

projects.name: Initial Configuration
projects.description: Set up basic development tools, API access, and local environment

tasks.title: ⭐ Verify API access and credentials
tasks.description: Test your API keys and ensure you can connect to the Orchestrator AI platform. Check authentication works correctly and verify your account has proper permissions.

tasks.title: Set up local development environment
tasks.description: Install necessary tools (Node.js, Python, or your preferred stack). Configure your IDE with proper extensions and set up your workspace.

tasks.title: Clone or access code repositories
tasks.description: Get access to relevant codebases. Set up version control if needed and familiarize yourself with the repository structure.

tasks.title: Review API documentation
tasks.description: Familiarize yourself with available endpoints and authentication methods. Bookmark key documentation pages and understand rate limits.

tasks.title: Create your first test connection
tasks.description: Make a simple API call to verify everything works. Start with a basic 'hello world' style request to confirm connectivity.

tasks.title: Set up environment variables
tasks.description: Configure your development environment with necessary API keys and configuration. Use secure storage methods and never commit secrets.

projects.name: First Agent
projects.description: Create and test your first AI agent to understand the development workflow

tasks.title: ⭐ Choose a simple use case
tasks.description: Pick something straightforward for your first agent - maybe data formatting, simple Q&A, or basic automation. Start small to learn the platform.

tasks.title: Configure agent settings
tasks.description: Set up the agent's name, description, and basic parameters. Choose appropriate model and settings based on your use case.

tasks.title: Test agent with sample input
tasks.description: Run your agent with test data. Verify it produces expected outputs and handles different input formats correctly.

tasks.title: Handle edge cases
tasks.description: Test with various inputs including edge cases, empty inputs, and invalid data. Add error handling if needed.

tasks.title: Document your agent
tasks.description: Write down what the agent does, how to use it, input/output formats, and any important notes for future reference.

tasks.title: Add input validation
tasks.description: Implement proper input validation. Check for required fields, data types, and format constraints before processing.

projects.name: Development Best Practices
projects.description: Establish good development habits and workflows for sustainable development

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up version control
tasks.description: Initialize git repository. Create meaningful commit messages. Set up branch strategy and understand your team's workflow.

tasks.title: Write unit tests
tasks.description: Create tests for your agent logic. Test individual functions and components to ensure reliability.

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
tasks.description: Configure automated testing and deployment. Set up GitHub Actions or similar CI/CD tools for continuous integration.

tasks.title: Document your code
tasks.description: Add inline comments and documentation. Write clear function descriptions and maintain up-to-date README files.

tasks.title: Review security practices
tasks.description: Ensure API keys are secure. Review authentication and authorization. Never expose secrets in code or repositories.

tasks.title: Set up monitoring
tasks.description: Configure error tracking and monitoring. Set up alerts for critical issues and track agent performance metrics.

efforts.name: API Integration
efforts.description: Learn to integrate with Orchestrator AI APIs and build robust integrations

projects.name: API Fundamentals
projects.description: Master the basics of API integration and authentication

tasks.title: ⭐ Understand authentication flow
tasks.description: Learn how API authentication works. Understand token management, refresh tokens, and secure credential storage.

tasks.title: Explore available endpoints
tasks.description: Review all available API endpoints. Understand request/response formats and available operations.

tasks.title: Create API client wrapper
tasks.description: Build a reusable API client wrapper for common operations. Handle authentication, retries, and error handling.

tasks.title: Implement rate limiting
tasks.description: Add rate limiting to your API calls. Respect API limits and implement backoff strategies for rate limit errors.

tasks.title: Handle API errors gracefully
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling. Parse error responses and provide meaningful error messages to users.

tasks.title: Add request logging
tasks.description: Log API requests and responses for debugging. Include request IDs and timestamps for troubleshooting.

projects.name: Advanced Integration
projects.description: Build sophisticated integrations with external services and data sources

tasks.title: ⭐ Integrate with external services
tasks.description: Connect your agents to external APIs. Handle authentication, rate limits, and data transformation between systems.

tasks.title: Implement caching strategies
tasks.description: Add caching for frequently accessed data. Reduce API calls and improve performance while managing cache invalidation.

tasks.title: Build data transformation layer
tasks.description: Create utilities to transform data between different formats. Handle schema mapping and data validation.

tasks.title: Set up webhook handlers
tasks.description: Implement webhook endpoints to receive real-time updates. Verify webhook signatures and handle async processing.

tasks.title: Create integration tests
tasks.description: Write tests that verify end-to-end integration. Test with real API endpoints in a test environment.

tasks.title: Document integration patterns
tasks.description: Document common integration patterns and best practices. Create examples and templates for future integrations.

efforts.name: Agent Development
efforts.description: Develop production-ready agents with proper architecture and best practices

tasks.title: ⭐ Understand agent architecture patterns
tasks.description: Learn common agent patterns: single-purpose agents, multi-step workflows, and agent orchestration. Study examples and best practices.

tasks.title: Design agent structure
tasks.description: Plan your agent's architecture. Define inputs, processing steps, outputs, and error handling strategies.

tasks.title: Implement modular components
tasks.description: Break down agent logic into reusable modules. Create clear separation of concerns and maintainable code structure.

tasks.title: Add configuration management
tasks.description: Make agents configurable through settings. Allow customization without code changes for flexibility.

tasks.title: Implement state management
tasks.description: Handle agent state across multiple invocations. Store context and maintain conversation history when needed.

tasks.title: Create agent templates
tasks.description: Build reusable agent templates for common patterns. Speed up development of similar agents.

projects.name: Testing & Quality
projects.description: Ensure your agents are reliable and production-ready

tasks.title: ⭐ Write comprehensive tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for your agents. Test happy paths, edge cases, and error scenarios.

tasks.title: Set up test data
tasks.description: Create realistic test datasets. Include edge cases, invalid inputs, and various scenarios your agent should handle.

tasks.title: Implement test automation
tasks.description: Automate test execution. Run tests on every commit and before deployments to catch issues early.

tasks.title: Add performance testing
tasks.description: Test agent performance under load. Measure response times, throughput, and resource usage.

tasks.title: Create quality checklists
tasks.description: Develop checklists for agent quality: error handling, logging, documentation, and security.

tasks.title: Set up code review process
tasks.description: Establish code review practices. Get feedback on agent logic, architecture, and best practices.

projects.name: Deployment & Operations
projects.description: Deploy agents to production and monitor their performance

tasks.title: ⭐ Create deployment checklist
tasks.description: Document your deployment process. Include pre-deployment checks, deployment steps, and rollback procedures.

tasks.title: Set up staging environment
tasks.description: Create a staging environment that mirrors production. Test deployments in staging before production.

tasks.title: Implement monitoring and alerts
tasks.description: Set up monitoring for agent performance, errors, and usage metrics. Configure alerts for critical issues.

tasks.title: Create runbooks
tasks.description: Document common operational tasks. Include troubleshooting guides and incident response procedures.

tasks.title: Plan for scaling
tasks.description: Design your system for growth. Consider performance, resource usage, and cost optimization as usage increases.

tasks.title: Establish backup and recovery
tasks.description: Plan for agent failures and data loss. Implement backups and recovery procedures for critical agents.
